alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Laurens and southern Wilkinson Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Jeffersonville to near Montrose to near Plainfield, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Irwinton, East Dublin, Dexter, Dudley, Cadwell, Toomsboro, Rentz, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Nicklesville, Harlow, and Chappells Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
